title: Getting bad lag spikes
body: Never gotten lag spikes in League before but recently I have been it could be an issue with my internet though. I've got new internet but it's actually a really good connection (cox internet ~100Mbps). I live in Arizona and I've never had ping issues ever. Anyone help me out with this please?

replies.body: I have the same problem  and I need solutions! I have a very good ping and fps but I get a huge spike lag everytime I use abilities
Yeah me too, I have a good computer and my fps is great and I have good ping but just random huge ping spikes, not when I use abilities just in general. Upvote please!

Hey Nihil8!

If you are experiencing extremely high lag spikes into the high hundreds or thousands, it can be hard to pin-point the exact root cause.  It could be something with your internet (even though its new), a 3rd party program, a setting on your network, or something else entirely.  The best way we can figure out the root cause is by eliminating some of the most common causes to lag spikes first.  Therefore, make sure to complete all of the steps in this Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/26932010-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

To be completely fair, there is quite a lot of steps in this guide.  Yet, every single step in this guide can be the root cause to the lag spikes that you are having.  If none of these steps helped to alleviate the spikes, don't lose all hope just yet!  Make sure to [send us a request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and we'll be more than happy to help look into this further.  If you do send us a request, include the following information:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

Same here! I've gone down to Bronze V and lost all my LP due to this issue - I went 5/0 with Lee and then all of a sudden disconnected, got koed by the buff monster and was stuck in a hell-hole situation. Tried reconnecting; but nothing worked!              {{item:3151}}
